001package io.jstach.rainbowgum.rabbitmq;
002
003import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogConfig;
004import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput;
005import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputProvider;
006import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProvider;
007import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogProviderRef;
008import io.jstach.rainbowgum.spi.RainbowGumServiceProvider;
009import io.jstach.svc.ServiceProvider;
010
011/**
012 * RabbitMQ initializer to register output provider with scheme
013 * {@value RabbitMQOutput#URI_SCHEME}.
014 */
015@ServiceProvider(RainbowGumServiceProvider.class)
016public class RabbitMQInitializer implements RainbowGumServiceProvider.Configurator {
017
018        /**
019         * Default constructor for service loader.
020         */
021        public RabbitMQInitializer() {
022        }
023
024        @Override
025        public boolean configure(LogConfig config, Pass pass) {
026                config.outputRegistry().register(RabbitMQOutput.URI_SCHEME, RabbitMQOutputProvider.INSTANCE);
027                return true;
028        }
029
030        private enum RabbitMQOutputProvider implements OutputProvider {
031
032                INSTANCE;
033
034                @Override
035                public LogProvider<LogOutput> provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
036                        return (name, config) -> {
037                                var uri = ref.uri();
038                                var properties = config.properties();
039                                name = name.equals("") ? "rabbitmq" : name;
040                                RabbitMQOutputBuilder b = new RabbitMQOutputBuilder(name);
041                                b.uri(uri);
042                                b.fromProperties(properties, ref);
043                                return b.build();
044                        };
045                }
046
047        }
048
049}
